subject: Re: written recommendation of super.setUp/tearDown ?
msgSnippet: ... JUnit ... find ... Is ... I am quite sure that neither of the original author has ever recommended this, infact, if you look at all the tests that come
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Dave Brosius" <dbrosius@q...> wrote:
> I have it in my head that the junit folks recommend always calling
> super.setUp/tearDown from a user declared setUp/tearDown, even if the
JUnit
> test in question is directly derived from TestCase. However i cannot
find
> any written (web page) recommendation to so. Is this still the case?
Is
> there a documented recommendation some where?
>

I am quite sure that neither of the original author has ever
recommended this, infact, if you look at all the tests that come
alongwith junit, you'll not find that this recommendation is never
taken into consideration.
Cheers,
Vivek
